Help:Node.title: Assassin
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: assassin
Important Commands: sneakattack, spar, @speak, wield
The assassin career is not fully implemented yet; however, a few of the skills that it gives are.
To use sneakattack: First, you need to enter combat mode. To do this type: 'SPAR' or 'FIGHT'. Now type 'SNEAKATTACK (person)'. Your sneak attack will or will not work depending on their level of observation, which you have no way of assessing unfortunately, so be careful.
If you want to attack someone using something other than your fists, you need to wield a weapon. Type 'WIELD MY WEAPON'. When you attack, it will automatically use your weapon to strike your victim.
You also acquire the language Dusky with this profession. To speak it simply type @SPEAK DUSKY. To switch back to Calabrese, type @SPEAK CALABRESE.
You may have difficulty finding out information in game about assassins. If you need assistance, feel free to page one of the staff members for clarification.
See Also: combat, consent, roleplaying
